org.daisy.dotify.common.io

Class ByteArrayStreamJuggler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.dotify.common.io.ByteArrayStreamJuggler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, StreamJuggler

    public class ByteArrayStreamJuggler
extends java.lang.Object
implements StreamJuggler
    Provides an in-memory stream juggler.
